definitions.definition: Any of several rodents of either of the taxonomic families Hystricidae ( Old World porcupines ) or Erethizontidae ( New World porcupines ), both from the infraorder Hystricognathi , noted for their sharp spines or quills , which are raised when the animal is attacked or surprised.

main_definition: Any of several rodents of either of the taxonomic families Hystricidae ( Old World porcupines ) or Erethizontidae ( New World porcupines ), both from the infraorder Hystricognathi , noted for their sharp spines or quills , which are raised when the animal is attacked or surprised.
